activities.description: Get the tables, year, month, and day to archive

sqlReaderQuery.value:

    TableName,
    ArchivalYear, 
    ArchivalMonth, 
    ArchivalDay
FROM dbo.MetadataTable 
WHERE IsActive = 1;

}

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
    SUM([Read]) AS ReadSum,
    SUM([Write]) AS WriteSum,
    SUM([Remaining]) AS RemainingSum,
    DB_NAME() AS DatabaseName,
    [Year],
    DATENAME(MONTH, DATEFROMPARTS(Year, Month, 1)) AS MonthName,
    [Day],
    CASE 
        WHEN MAX(CASE WHEN Status = 'Failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 THEN 'Failed'
        WHEN MAX(CASE WHEN Status = 'Archived' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE 'Success'
    END AS FinalStatus,
    Remarks,
    FORMAT(
        GETUTCDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Singapore Standard Time', 
        'MMMM dd, yyyy'
    ) AS DateToday
FROM ArchivalMonitoring
WHERE PipelineRunID = '@{pipeline().RunId}'
GROUP BY [Year], [Month], [Day], [Remarks];
